document_data.name: Alchemist's Supplies
document_data.mainbody: '''Alchemist's supplies''' were an array of supplies that were used by a prospective [[alchemist]].
document_data.Description: A typical set of alchemist's supplies included two glass [[beaker]]s, a metal frame to hold a beaker in place over an open flame, a glass stirring rod, a small [[mortar and pestle]], and a pouch of common alchemical ingredients such as [[salt]], powdered [[iron]], and similar materials.
